Bash(__NEW_LINE_ce73d5aac2e99410__ python -c "
import asyncio, sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
from pathlib import Path
from playwright.async_api import async_playwright
from config import settings

NIX_CHROMIUM = ''/nix/store/kcvsxrmgwp3ffz5jijyy7wn9fcsjl4hz-playwright-browsers-1.55.0-with-cjk/chromium-1187/chrome-linux/chrome''

async def login\(\):
    ud = str\(Path\(settings.chrome_user_data_dir\).expanduser\(\)\)
    Path\(ud\).mkdir\(parents=True, exist_ok=True\)
    Path\(''output/debug''\).mkdir\(parents=True, exist_ok=True\)

    async with async_playwright\(\) as p:
        browser = await p.chromium.launch_persistent_context\(
            user_data_dir=ud, executable_path=NIX_CHROMIUM, headless=True,
            viewport={''width'': 1280, ''height'': 720},
            args=[''--no-sandbox'',''--disable-setuid-sandbox'',''--disable-dev-shm-usage'',''--disable-gpu'',''--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled''],
            user_agent=''Mozilla/5.0 \(X11; Linux x86_64\) AppleWebKit/537.36 \(KHTML, like Gecko\) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'',
        \)
        page = browser.pages[0] if browser.pages else await browser.new_page\(\)
        page.set_default_timeout\(15000\)

        print\(''1/5 Navigating to Google sign-in...''\)
        await page.goto\(''https://accounts.google.com/signin'', wait_until=''networkidle'', timeout=30000\)
        await asyncio.sleep\(2\)

        print\(''2/5 Entering email...''\)
        e = await page.wait_for_selector\(''input[type=""email""]'', timeout=10000\)
        await e.fill\(settings.google_account_email\)
        await page.click\(''#identifierNext''\)
        await asyncio.sleep\(4\)

        print\(''3/5 Entering password...''\)
        pw = await page.wait_for_selector\(''input[type=""password""]'', timeout=15000\)
        await pw.fill\(settings.google_account_password\)
        await page.click\(''#passwordNext''\)
        await asyncio.sleep\(6\)

        await page.screenshot\(path=''output/debug/2fa-number.png''\)
        print\(''4/5 2FA - CHECK YOUR PHONE! Screenshot saved to output/debug/2fa-number.png''\)
        sys.stdout.flush\(\)

        # Wait up to 90s, polling every 5s
        for i in range\(18\):
            await asyncio.sleep\(5\)
            url = page.url
            if ''challenge'' not in url and ''signin/challenge'' not in url:
                print\(f''  Approved after {\(i+1\)*5}s!''\)
                break
            print\(f''  Waiting... {\(i+1\)*5}s''\)
            sys.stdout.flush\(\)
        
        await asyncio.sleep\(3\)
        await page.screenshot\(path=''output/debug/after-2fa.png''\)
        print\(f''  URL after 2FA: {page.url}''\)

        print\(''5/5 Navigating to NotebookLM...''\)
        await page.goto\(''https://notebooklm.google.com'', wait_until=''networkidle'', timeout=30000\)
        await asyncio.sleep\(3\)
        await page.screenshot\(path=''output/debug/notebooklm-result.png''\)
        
        if ''accounts.google.com'' in page.url:
            print\(''FAILED - still on login page''\)
            sys.exit\(1\)
        else:
            print\(''SUCCESS! Logged into NotebookLM. Session saved.''\)

        await browser.close\(\)

asyncio.run\(login\(\)\)
")
